data.title: bd-ubxq: fix maw status --watch errors if working copy stale
data.description: When the default workspace working copy is stale, jj workspace list and jj status fail with errors. Previously this caused maw status (including --watch mode) to bail. Now collect_status() catches stale errors from each jj command, sets is_stale=true, and continues with degraded data instead of crashing.
